calc.saver package¶

Module contents¶

calc.saver.dump(obj, file)¶

dill.dump() obj to file.dill.YYYYMMDDHHMMSS

Parameters:
  • file (str) –
  • obj (object) – object to save
calc.saver.load(file)¶

  • call custom-built dump (eg. tensorflow-based objects)
  • dump()
